text:
Naagin (English: serpent) is an Indian supernatural Hindi language television series. It was produced by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor. It aired on weekends at 8 pm IST on Colors TV.
The first season began airing on November 1 2015 and ended on June 5 2016. At that time, it was one of the highest rated shows on Indian television.
